 2024-06302024-05-31RCMP, PS
ActRoyal Canadian Mounted Police Pension Continuation Act
SubjectRoyal Canadian Mounted Police (Dependants) Pension Fund Increase in Benefits Order
PrecisROYAL CANADIAN MOUNTED POLICE (DEPENDANTS) PENSION FUND INCREASE IN BENEFITS ORDER in order to (1) increase pensions for widows by 5% on April 1, 2023 and by 1.2% on April 1, 2024 and April 1, 2025; (2) increase the lump sum benefits payable on the death of a former member who contributed to the plan and who is not survived by a widow by 5% on April 1, 2023 and by 1.2% on April 1, 2024 and April 1, 2025; and (3) increase the residual amounts payable on the death of a former member’s widow who dies in the 2024, 2025 or 2026 plan year by increasing the former member’s deemed contributions as of April 1, 2022 by 5% on April 1, 2023 and by 1.2% on April 1, 2024 and April 1, 2025.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2024-0119 Publication Date: 2024-06-19
